text: if you've ever wanted to listen to music

was this white handset cord these are
the coiled cords that go from the

okay the first step is to remove the

about two inches down from one earphone
and we're also going to cut off both
Jack's
off our handset cord after we trim the

it's white heat shrink tubing I picked

slip two small pieces on the end of our
